Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Clifford Swezey to receive a refund from the New York state teachers' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Clifford Swezey to receive a refund from the New York state teachers' retirement system due to overpayment.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Clifford Swezey to receive a refund from the New York state teachers' retirement system
